document_data.name: ''Ring of Dizziness''
document_data.mainbody: A '''''ring of dizziness''''' was a [[curse]]d [[enchanted]] [[ring]] that assaulted the wearer with unbearable dizziness.
document_data.Description: These items appeared to be normal magical rings and were often mistaken for ''[[ring of protection|rings of protection]]''.
document_data.Powers: The power of a ''ring of dizziness'' only afflicted the wearer when they were in the midst of martial combat, bombarding them with violent dizziness that often prevented them from attacking while simultaneously making them easy targets for their enemies.
document_data.History: These rings could sometimes be found by unlucky explorers within tombs in [[Mulhorand]]. They were placed intentionally to serve as a deterrant for grave robbers.
